name: jppolprebid
description: Shared prebid.js implementation for JP, EB and POL

scripts.build-prebid: npm install ./ && npm --prefix ./node_modules/prebid.js/ install ./node_modules/prebid.js && cd ./node_modules/prebid.js;../.bin/gulp build --modules=../../prebid/bidderAdapters.json;cd ../../ && cp ./node_modules/prebid.js/build/dist/prebid.js ./prebid/

author: jppol
